anya-e0605n:10: Yo lokatthāya buddho dhanasutabhariyāaṅgajīve cajitvā pūretvā āramiyo tidasamanupame bodhipakkhīyadhamme,
anya-e0605n:11: Patvā bodhiṃ visuddhaṃ sakalaguṇadadaṃ seṭṭhabhūto tiloke,
anya-e0605n:12: Katvā dukkhassa antaṃ katasubhajanataṃ dukkhato mocayittha.
anya-e0605n:15: Nāhu yenapi tulyo kusalamahimato uttamo bhūtaloke tassevāyaṃ uvimhaṃ suvipulamamalaṃ bodhisambhārabhūtaṃ,
anya-e0605n:16: Hetuṃ hetvānurūpaṃ sugatagataphalaṃ bhāsato me suṇātha.
anya-e0605n:19: Jāto yo navame khaṇe sutadharo sīlena suddhindriyo saṃsāraṃ ayato bhavakkayakaraṃ disvā sivaṃ khemato,
anya-e0605n:20: Taṃ sampāpakamaggadesakamuniṃ sampūjayanto tato uddhānussatibhāvanādikamato sampādaye taṃ sivaṃ.
anya-e0605n:23: Buddhoti ko buddhaguṇo ti ko so,
anya-e0605n:48: Ye tesu devā manujā ca brahmā,
anya-e0605n:73: Na tena tulyo paramo ca vijjati;
anya-e0605n:74: Kiṃ taṃ guṇaṃ taṃ sadisena dinnaṃ,
anya-e0605n:117: Uppannuppannake so jinavaramatule pūjayitvā asesaṃ buddho eso hi oso bhavati niyamato byākato tehi tehi tesaṃ tesaṃ jinānaṃ acanamanupamaṃ pūjayitvā sirena,
anya-e0605n:118: Taṃ taṃ dukkhaṃ sahitvā sakalaguṇadadaṃ pāramī pūrayittha.
anya-e0605n:173: Sato ca sampajāno ca mātukucchimhi okkami;
anya-e0605n:177: Tuṭṭhahaṭṭhā va sā mātā puttaṃ passati kucchiyaṃ.
anya-e0605n:186: Devā ca nāgā asurā ca yakkhā;
anya-e0605n:211: Sīhanādaṃ nadī tesaṃ devatānaṃ hi sāvayaṃ.
anya-e0605n:213: Tato puttaṃ gahetvāna gatā mātā sakaṅgharaṃ,
anya-e0605n:227: Kālakkamena cando va vaḍḍhanto vaḍḍhite kule,
anya-e0605n:230: Siddhathako hi siddhattho laddhā deviṃ yasodharaṃ,
anya-e0605n:238: Namo tassa yato mahimato yassa tamo na
anya-e0605n:324: Hitvā kathaṃ nu padamuddhari so nirāso.
anya-e0605n:329: Hitvā kathaṃ nu padamuddhari so nirāso.
anya-e0605n:334: Hitvā kathaṃ nu padamuddhari so nirāso.
anya-e0605n:339: Hitvā kathaṃ nu padamuddhari so nirāso.
anya-e0605n:344: Hitvā kathaṃ nu padamuddhari so nirāso.
anya-e0605n:359: Naccanti tā surapure vaṇitā va tāva.
anya-e0605n:379: Hitvā kathaṃ nu padamuddhari so nirāso.
anya-e0605n:384: Disvādisvā iti ratikaraṃ yāti hāhā kimīhā.
anya-e0605n:390: Hitvā gato so sugato gato va.
anya-e0605n:395: Hitvā gato so sugato gato va.
anya-e0605n:400: Hitvā gato so sugato gato va.
anya-e0605n:405: Hitvā gato so sugato gato va.
anya-e0605n:410: Hitvā gata so sugato gato va.
anya-e0605n:415: Hitvā gato so sugato gato va.
anya-e0605n:420: Hitvā gato so sugato gato va.
anya-e0605n:436: Hitvā gato so sugato va nūna.
anya-e0605n:441: Hitvā gato so sugato va nūna.
anya-e0605n:451: Hitvā gato so sugato va nūna.
anya-e0605n:481: Tathā hi māro pi tadāha santiṃ,
anya-e0605n:497: Lokāyātatayā kālo visesaṃ na na saṃsevi,
anya-e0605n:498: Visesaṃ na na saṃsevi lokā yātatayā kālo.
anya-e0605n:505: Kaṅkhāgāhakakaṅkhāgha hā hā kaṅkhā kahaṃ kahaṃ.
anya-e0605n:518: Nunnānenāni nūna na nānanaṃ nānanena no.
anya-e0605n:523: Devānaṃ nandano devo devadeva na nandi no,
anya-e0605n:566: Datvāna maṃsaṃ rajjaṃ pitā suddhodano tadā,
anya-e0605n:575: Etha gaṇgatha bandhatha chaṭṭetha ceṭakaṃ imaṃ,
anya-e0605n:581: Cakkāvudhaṃ khipento pi nāsakkhi kiñci kātave,
anya-e0605n:584: Siddhattha kasmā āsi nu āsane mama santake,
anya-e0605n:585: Uṭṭhehi āsanā no ce phālemi hadayaṃ tava.
anya-e0605n:588: Pitā vudikkhi taṃ māraṃ mettāyanto dayaparo.
anya-e0605n:590: Tadā so asambhivācaṃ sīhanādaṃ nadī muni,
anya-e0605n:591: Na jānāti sayaṃ mayhaṃ dāsabhāvapiyaṃ khaḷo.
anya-e0605n:593: Yena kenaci kammena jāto devapure vare,
anya-e0605n:603: Ko hi nāma kareyyañño anummatto sacetano.
anya-e0605n:608: Nāhaṃ manussomanusso na brahmā na ca devatā,
anya-e0605n:612: Buddho bodhitale hutvā tāremi janataṃ bahuṃ.
anya-e0605n:614: Samantā dhajinaṃ disvā yuddhaṃ māraṃ savāhanaṃ,
anya-e0605n:615: Yuddhāya paccugacchāmi mā maṃ ṭhānā acāvayi.
anya-e0605n:617: Yante taṃ nappasahati senaṃ loko sadevako,
anya-e0605n:618: Tante paññāya gacchāmi āmaṃ pattaṃ va asmanā.
anya-e0605n:620: Icchanto sāsape gabbhe caṅkamāmi ito cito,
anya-e0605n:624: Atthi thāmaṃ balaṃ mayhaṃ pāṇaghāto na vaṭṭati.
anya-e0605n:627: Mayhaṃ hi tena pāpena sallāpo pi na yujjati.
anya-e0605n:630: Kampitā maddiyā dānā sakkhi hoti ayaṃ mahī.
anya-e0605n:632: Iti vatvā dakkhiṇaṃ bāhuṃ pathaviyā paṇamayi,
anya-e0605n:636: Tasmiṃ majjhe gato māro sapariso bhayatajjito.
anya-e0605n:642: Purato gacchati cando rajatacakkaṃ va ambare,
anya-e0605n:648: Sakko tasmiṃ khaṇe saṅkhaṃ dhamanto abhidhāvati,
anya-e0605n:654: Evaṃ dasasahassamhi sakko brahmā ca devatā,
anya-e0605n:660: Tattha naccanti gāyanti seḷenti vādayanti ca,
anya-e0605n:687: Tato hi dutiye yāme yathāyammupage sari,
anya-e0605n:693: Tato so tatiye yāme dvādasaṅge asesato,
anya-e0605n:703: Paññāya mohaṃ chetvāna micchādiṭṭhi tatheva ca.
anya-e0605n:711: Evaṃ dānādinā taṃ taṃ kilesaṇgaṃ vinodayaṃ,
anya-e0605n:712: Suvaḍḍhitā mahāpaññā kathaṃ santiṃ na rūhati.
anya-e0605n:718: Ekkattha dāni sampattiṃ deti bodhiṃ asaṃsayaṃ.
anya-e0605n:723: Savāsane kilese so jhāpentonumattaṃ pi ca,
anya-e0605n:748: Addhā laddhā suladdhaṃ vatamiti satataṃ cintayanto subodhiṃ;
anya-e0605n:756: Na pūjaye ko hi naro sacetano.
anya-e0605n:784: Ye pissa te bhagavato ca acintiyādī,
anya-e0605n:810: Takkabyākaraṇañca dhammavinayaṃ sutvā pi yo paññavā,
anya-e0605n:812: Hetuñcāpi phalena tena saphalaṃ sampassamāno tato bodhiṃ saddahateva tassa mahatāvāyamato sambhavaṃ.
anya-e0605n:831: Thalaje jalaje vāpi sugandhe ca agandhake.
anya-e0605n:846: Vassikā mallikā sālā koviḷārā ca pāṭali.
anya-e0605n:848: Indīvarā asokā ca kaṇikārā ca makulā,
anya-e0605n:851: Ete caññe ca rukkhā ca valliyo cāpi pupphitā,
anya-e0605n:855: Kāḷā setā ca mañjaṭṭha nekavaṇṇā supupphitā.
anya-e0605n:863: Athetta sakuṇā santi dijā mañjussarā subhā,
anya-e0605n:870: Tasmiṃ hi kinnarā kiccaṃ padīpena karīyati.
anya-e0605n:876: Sakuṇānaṃ hi saddena mayūrānaṃ hi kekayā.
anya-e0605n:881: Pabbatānaṃ hi obhāsā maṇīnaṃ jotiyāpi ca,
anya-e0605n:883: Evaṃ sabbaṅgasampannaṃ kiṃ siyā nandanaṃ vanaṃ.
anya-e0605n:890: Nāgaloke manusse ca deve brahme ca yaṃ siyā,
anya-e0605n:897: Buddho bodhesi sattānaṃ tassa pūjemi taṃ dhanaṃ.
anya-e0605n:899: Khomaṃ koseyyaṃ kappāsaṃ sāṇaṃ bhaṅgañca kambalaṃ,
anya-e0605n:900: Dukūlāni ca dibbāni dussāni vividhāni te.
anya-e0605n:903: Yassa siddhaṃ siyā tassa dussāni pujayāmahaṃ.
anya-e0605n:956: Svāyaṃ dhammo vinayo ca desito sādhukaṃ mayā,
anya-e0605n:957: Mamaccayena so satthā dhātu cāpi sarīrajā.
anya-e0605n:965: Tasmā hi tassa saddhammaṃ uggaṇhitvā yathātathaṃ,
anya-e0605n:966: Yo deseti sambuddho ti natvāna pūjayāmahaṃ.
anya-e0605n:977: Yattha katthaci sayito āsinno caṅkamepi vā,
anya-e0605n:980: Na sañjānanti ye buddhaṃ evarūpo ti ñātve,
anya-e0605n:981: Kataṃ taṃ paṭimaṃ sabbaṃ natvāna pūjayāmahaṃ.
anya-e0605n:995: Paññā ca me sijjhatu yāva bodhiṃ.
anya-e0605n:1004: Bhogo ca kāyo ca mamesa laddho,
